title: 17th C French punch cut type
content:
I also shot type in this book "Historie De Leglise et Diocese et Ville Universite D'Orleans" 1647

If you are keen on 17th C French type here is your chance to have a look at some.

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/ebensorkin/sets/72157612011801911/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100416030148/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/ebensorkin/sets/72157612011801911/ "http://www.flickr.com/photos/ebensorkin/sets/72157612011801911/")

Extra points for typeface IDs of course!
author: Eben Sorkin
